description: A quick and secure way to carry your bike to the trailhead. Simply remove your bike’s front wheel, and load the bike onto the full wheel tray.Universal fork-down mount fits most bikes with standard 9mm axles.Installs without tools.Fits Yakima®, Thule®, and most factory cross bars.9mm skewer attaches to front fork of bike once wheel is removed.Quick release and tie-down strap for rear wheel are included.Fits wheels up to 3.5 in. wide.Supports up to 15.8kg (35lbs).
name: Swagman Standard Fork-Down Roof Rack
